favourite.article: I woke up this morning after attending wonderful blending conference with the California Churches in Anaheim, Fullerton, Yorba Linda, Riverside and Long Beach enjoying this hymn and remembering brother Howard Higashi's deep love for the Lord by singing this spiritual song and as I began to sing it, I became filled in my human spirit like it says in Ephesians 5:18 enjoying the divine life giving Spirit (1 Cor. 15:45b) so I sent it to my friends so they could enjoy being one spirit with the Lord (1 Cor. 6:17). (I used to sing stanza four line four "Open your being to Him, just call and let Him in, Oh Lord Jesus, breathe in Jesus" thank You Lord for providing Hymnal.net as a vehicle to touch You.

Thank You precious Jesus, lovely Jesus. This song brings me back to my first love to my lovely Jesus and renews and refreshes my love again again. I love Jesus I'm am one spirit with Him. "He who is joined to the Lord is one spirit".
I enjoy this love song to our Lord Jesus! I often pray the stanzas back to Him! Lord keep us loving You.

My LORD & Saviour JESUS CHRIST, THANK YOU FOR HELPING ME and Loving ME! I LOVE YOU, Because YOU LOVED me FIRST!
Really You are amazing!!!!!! Love You forever!!!
This is a very nice site for the saints to enjoy the hymns for Christ. Amen.
I love the Lord. I love this hymn. Lord Jesus You are so precious to me.
